contenidosVistosPorUsuario.title: Toy Story
contenidosVistosPorUsuario.actors: Tom Hanks, Tim Allen, Don Rickles, Jim Varney
contenidosVistosPorUsuario.plot: A cowboy doll is profoundly threatened and jealous when a new spaceman figure supplants him as top toy in a boy's room.

contenidosVistosPorUsuario.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2
contenidosVistosPorUsuario.actors: Ralph Fiennes, Michael Gambon, Alan Rickman, Daniel Radcliffe
contenidosVistosPorUsuario.plot: Harry, Ron, and Hermione search for Voldemort's remaining Horcruxes in their effort to destroy the Dark Lord as the final battle rages on at Hogwarts.

contenidosVistosPorUsuario.title: The Lion King
contenidosVistosPorUsuario.actors: Rowan Atkinson, Matthew Broderick, Niketa Calame-Harris, Jim Cummings
contenidosVistosPorUsuario.plot: A Lion cub crown prince is tricked by a treacherous uncle into thinking he caused his father's death and flees into exile in despair, only to learn in adulthood his identity and his responsibilities.

contenidosVistosPorUsuario.title: Inception
contenidosVistosPorUsuario.actors: Leonardo DiCaprio, Joseph Gordon-Levitt, Ellen Page, Tom Hardy
contenidosVistosPorUsuario.plot: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O.

contenidosVistosPorUsuario.title: It
contenidosVistosPorUsuario.actors: Jaeden Martell, Jeremy Ray Taylor, Sophia Lillis, Finn Wolfhard
contenidosVistosPorUsuario.plot: In the summer of 1989, a group of bullied kids band together to destroy a shape-shifting monster, which disguises itself as a clown and preys on the children of Derry, their small Maine town.
